com.google.wave.api
Class Installer

java.lang.Object
  com.google.wave.api.BlipContent
      com.google.wave.api.Element
          com.google.wave.api.Installer

public class Installer
extends Element

Installers are widgets that let Wave users install extensions on their account. Installers are identified by the URL that points to their manifest specification.

Author:
pamelafox@google.com (Pamela Fox)

Constructor Summary
Installer()
          Constructs an empty installer.
Installer(java.lang.String manifest)
          Constructs an installer for the specified manifest url.
 
Method Summary

          Returns the URL of the manifest XML.

          Changes the URL for the manifest to the given url.

Returns:

setManifest

public void setManifest(java.lang.String manifest)
Changes the URL for the manifest to the given url. This will cause the installer puzzle piece to be re-loaded.

Parameters:
manifest - the new manifest url.
